last_phrase: In conclusion, massaging the abdomen requires some level of expertise and gentleness due to the sensitivity of the soft tissues involved. Using vibration and pressure can promote better blood flow, increased metabolism, and easier bowel movements, especially for people with a tendency towards constipation.
